title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 300.13 - Desk reviews of the distribution and disbursement of support collections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 300.13 - Desk reviews of the distribution and disbursement of support collections

State Regulations

Pursuant to section
347.25
(a)(3)
of
this Title, a desk review is conducted by the support collection unit and the
public assistance unit of the social services district. The public assistance
unit shall be responsible for completing the necessary actions under section
347.25
(f)-(g)
of
this Title for desk review requests received by the support collection unit
from a current or former recipient of public assistance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
300.13

Adopted

New

York State Register May 4, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 18, eff. 5/4/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
